name: Solitaire Klondike Black
summary: The classic single player card game "Solitaire Klondike" arranged to Cool version! 300 questions in Stage Mode, and various problems are available in Randam Mode ! Play data such as time, and clear rate etc will be recorded in detail per difficulty level in Random mode! Fixed 300 stages in mixed difficulty level in Mode 1 and Mode 3 are available at Stage mode. Enjoy the sence of achivment deffrent from Randam ModeA Pause function is possible for time-consuming problems! You can continue playing casually anytime anywhere.
